```{python include=FALSE}
import altair as alt
import pandas as pd
source = pd.DataFrame({
    'a': ['A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'F', 'G', 'H', 'I'],
    'b': [28, 55, 43, 91, 81, 53, 19, 87, 52]
})
chart1 = alt.Chart(source).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('a:N',title='X-Axis label'),
    alt.Y('b:Q',title='Y-axis label')).to_json()
chart1
```
